changePinIntro: Your PIN is used to log into this app.
whyPair2FaDevice: You must pair a 2FA device before sending PKT
unpair2FaIntro: Enter the code generated by your 2FA device to unpair the devices.
ifYouLoseTheseWords: If you do, you will not be able to access your money
newWalletIntro1: You are about to create a new wallet
newWalletIntro2: Your wallet has a 15-word secret seed phrase that can be used to restore your wallet on another device.
newWalletIntro3: Write down this seed phrase and store store it in a safe, secure place.
seedPhraseIntro: Write down your seed phrase on a piece of paper and store in a safe place that you wont forget. You can use your seed phrase to restore your wallet if you lose or damage your device. If you lose these words, you will not be able to restore your wallet.
risk2: You forget where you put it
tip3: Store in a multiple secret places
writeDownMore: these 15 words on a piece of paper and keep it in a safe place. You will be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step.
seedPhraseWarning2: Keep private.Do not share with anyone
passwordHelpText: This will be used to encrypt your wallet
whyPassphrase: A passphrase is used to encrypt your wallet. If you lose this passphrase, you will not be able to access your money.
passphraseWarningCheckbox: I understand that Anode cannot recover this password for me.
walletCreatedIntro1: Your wallet has been set up.
walletCreatedIntro2: Your may now send or receive PKT ash between friends, family, or strangers.
verifyRecoveryPhraseCreateWalletIntro: Enter the 15 words you just saw below. If you lose these words, you may lose access to your money.
verifyRecoveryPhraseLoadWalletIntro: Type the seed phrase in the correct order to reload the wallet.
loadExistingWalletIntro1: You are about to load an existing wallet
loadExistingWalletIntro2: You will need to enter the 15 word seed phrase and password to open the wallet.
walletPassphraseIntro: Your wallet was encrypted using a passphrase that you created. Enter that passphrase here to unlock your wallet.
enterPassphraseHelp: This will be used to encrypt your wallet
remoteAddressHelpText: Type PKT address, name, or email
noteHelpText: Note will be saved securely on your device
createPinIntro: Your PIN is used to easily access your wallet.
logoutIntro1: You are about to disconnect your wallet
logoutIntro2: If you do this, you will no longer have access to your funds.
logoutIntro3: You can restore this wallet at any time using 15 word secret seed phrase and your password for that wallet.
logoutSuccessAlert: You have logged out of your account
pinChangedAlert: Your login PIN has been changed
newAddressAlert: A new address has been created
confirmDeleteContacts: Delete my contacts and transaction notes
pair2faDeviceIntro: Enter the code generated by your authentication device to unpair the devices
verify2faIntro: Enter the code generated by your authentication device to unpair the devices
newAddressHelp: Make this address easier to find
whatIsAddressCode1: This code is your account number
whatIsAddressCode2: Share it with people to receive payments
whatIsTransactionId1: This code is a payment confirmation
whatIsTransactionId2: Share it anyone who needs proof of payment
